Beethoven: Symphony No.7 - Royal Concertgebouw Orchestra

In his Seventh Symphony Beethoven calls on all the peoples of the world to be reconciled and to live as brothers. The symphony is as revolutionary as it is irresistible.

Performer: Iván Fischer
Orchestra : Royal Concertgebouw Orchestra
Duration: 38 mins
Instruments: flutes-oboes-trumpets-clarinets-horns
Date: 10 January 2014
Place: Het Concertgebouw, Concertgebouwplein, Amsterdam
